channel.title: Trying to connect with galkons to a pi
channel.description:
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 [/code]
I get that error, what do I need to define in class Player?

item.source: Trying to connect with galkons to a pi

item.title: Trying to connect with galkons to a pi
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Hash1 Single, post:1, topic:427611”]RS2 user client - release #317 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36

I get that error, what do I need to define in class Player?[/quote]

Nothing. Packet 123 is a packet sent by a PI server to prevent non-PI clients from connecting.

All you have to do is check for the packet, then pass it as normal.

if (packetOpcode == 123) {
    packetOpcode = -1;
    return true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to connect with galkons to a pi
